title: Fix mobile search form alignment and remove extra spacing wrappers across Home/Tags/Tag/Pond pages

requirements.summary: Apply `margin-block-end: auto` to the mobile search modal form to fix vertical alignment on mobile.
acceptanceCriteria: On mobile, the search form in the mobile search modal has `margin-block-end: auto` applied (via inline style or equivalent CSS).
No layout regressions in the mobile search header (input remains vertically centered and full-width).

file_operations.description: Add `marginBlockEnd: 'auto'` (or equivalent) styling to the search <form> in the mobile search modal header so it aligns correctly on mobile, without changing shadcn/ui source files.

requirements.summary: Remove padding from the Home page wrapper div around the tabs header area.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page no longer applies `py-4` and `px-4` padding from that wrapper around the tabs header area.
Desktop layout remains aligned within the `lg:container` grid.

file_operations.description: Update the wrapper div currently using `className="py-4 px-4 lg:px-0 lg:py-0"` to remove the padding classes (or remove the wrapper if safe), ensuring the tabs header area no longer receives that padding and desktop alignment within `lg:container` remains intact.

requirements.summary: Remove bottom margin from the Tags (Tag Hub) tabs header divider container.
acceptanceCriteria: The Tags (Tag Hub) header divider container does not include `mb-4`.
No unwanted vertical gap appears below the tabs header on the Tags page.

file_operations.description: Ensure the tabs header divider container on the Tags (Tag Hub) page does not apply `mb-4` (e.g., remove `mb-4` from the `border-b border-border bg-background` container if present) so there is no extra vertical gap below the tabs header.

requirements.summary: Remove the `mb-4` spacing effect from the Tag page Tabs root container by overriding at the page level.
acceptanceCriteria: The Tag page Tabs root container has no `margin-bottom: 1rem` effect (no `mb-4` visible in computed styles).
No changes are made inside `frontend/src/components/ui/*` (compose/override from the page level instead).

file_operations.description: Override the shadcn/ui Tabs root spacing from within TagPage (e.g., pass a `className` that cancels `mb-4` such as `mb-0`) so the Tabs root container no longer has the `mb-4` margin effect, without editing any files under `frontend/src/components/ui/*`.

requirements.summary: Remove the always-rendered mobile padding spacer on the Pond page and render mobile Join CTA spacing only when needed (non-members).
acceptanceCriteria: When the user is already a pond member, there is no empty padded spacer area at the top of the pond feed on mobile.
The Join Pond CTA still appears on mobile for non-members, with appropriate spacing, but without an always-present empty wrapper.

file_operations.description: Refactor the mobile-only join CTA wrapper currently rendered as `div className="py-4 px-4 lg:hidden"` so it only renders when the Join Pond section should be shown (i.e., when membership is known and the user is not a member), eliminating the empty padded space for members on mobile.
